otherNames: The Presence of Evil Spirits, 邪神降世，我有一座大凶狱
synopsis: The evil god of doom has come, feeding on humans and attacking China! Little do they know that I hold the Demon Prison in my hands, and all the gods and demons of China for thousands of years have been secretly detained here! Just for this moment... to destroy the foreign gods and clean up the world! - Of course, if you surrender, this warden can consider letting you evil gods work on sewing machines in the evil prison, with food and accommodation provided.
